headline: Will Gartner’s AI Exposure Endorsement Change Tenable Holdings' (TENB) Cyber Risk Leadership Narrative?
summary: Earlier in 2026, Tenable Holdings launched Tenable One AI Exposure, a new capability in its exposure management platform that unifies AI protection, discovery and governance across SaaS, cloud, APIs and agents to address the emerging “AI exposure gap.” The release is reinforced by Gartner naming Tenable a leader in the 2025 Magic Quadrant for Exposure Assessment Platforms and calling it the company to beat in AI-powered exposure assessment, underlining strong third-party validation of its...

headline: Reach Security Named a Representative Provider in Gartner® Innovation Insight for Automated Security Control Assessment (ASCA)
summary: According to Gartner, by 2030, organizations that successfully operationalize ASCA technologies will experience a 25% reduction in cybersecurity incidents San Francisco, CA. January 27th, 2026 - Reach Security announced today that it has been recognized as a Representative Provider in the Gartner Innovation Insight for Automated Security Control Assessment (ASCA) report.
